attributes.action: revoke the honours bestowed, prematurely, on the English cricket team after their Ashes win of 2005.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In response to a truly disastrous six months of cricket, the MBEs and OBEs conferred on the English cricket team and its coach should be revoked. Honours such as these should be reserved for truly exceptional one-off achievements or lifetime contributions. They should not be given out on the back of one (count them) admirable, but not truly exceptionable, series win.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
